arcs.headline: A massive leap for Audio: Music, Emotions, and Transcription
arcs.summary: We've overhauled our audio stack with three major additions: 'elevenmusic' for generating 5-minute tracks, an upgrade to ElevenLabs v3 for emotive speech (laughter, crying), and Whisper Large V3 for accurate transcription. We also added new API endpoints to discover these models and manage their permissions.

arcs.headline: Fresh look: A redesigned frontend and smoother login
arcs.summary: The platform received a visual polish today. We introduced a redesigned header, an always-visible AI theme bar, and a sleek new look for the authorization page. Under the hood, the Account API now serves up avatars and simplified balance data for a seamless developer experience.

arcs.headline: Meet Polly: Your new AI coding companion on Discord
arcs.summary: Community collaboration just got an upgrade with Polly, a new AI bot bridging Discord and GitHub. Users can now search the codebase and manage issues directly from chat. We also prepped the dashboard for the upcoming Google Summer of Code cohort.

arcs.headline: Sharper images and smarter search
arcs.summary: We optimized the Flux Klein, Sana, and Twinflow models for better stability and speed, while fixing aspect ratio bugs in Klein-9B. Additionally, the Gemini-search registry was updated to reflect more efficient pricing estimates.

one_liner: A huge day for sound: we launched AI music generation, emotive speech, and transcription, alongside a fresh look for the dashboard.
